casebody.data:
Delveckia WISE
v.
Julie PRICE, Tiny Ballard and PHC-Morgan City L.P. d/b/a Teche Regional Medical Center No. 2018-CC-0879 Supreme Court of Louisiana. September 28, 2018

ON SUPERVISORY WRITS TO THE 16 TH JUDICIAL DISTRICT COURT FOR THE PARISH OF ST. MARY

Writ denied. CRICHTON, J., would grant and assigns reasons. I find the trial court's ruling was an abuse of discretion and in direct contravention of La. C.C.P. art. 966 and La. Dist. Ct. Rules 9.8 and 9.9. Therefore, I would grant this writ application and remand the matter to the trial court to rule on the motion for summary judgment based on all pleadings, affidavits, depositions, answers to interrogatories, and admissions on file as of September 20, 2017. See Newsome v. Homer Memorial Medical Center , 10-0564 (La. 4/9/10), 32 So.3d 800 .
